findings.title: Mint count initialization
findings.description: Token mint count variable is initialized with one that could cause error while counting the total number of minted NFTs.

findings.title: General Recommendation
findings.description: Some suggestions and best practices are also provided in order to improve the code quality and security posture.

findings.title: Function Fails to return dust
findings.description: mintWithETH() function fails for test cases with msg.value above mintPriceInETH and seaBal of msg.sender is less than seaAmountForExemptFee.

findings.title: Unlocked pragma (pragma solidity ^0.8.0)
findings.description: It is recommended to lock the pragma version to a specific one (e.g., 0.8.7) instead of using an unlocked version (^0.8.0), and avoid using experimental Solidity features.
